name: AddBlocksToScreen
label: AddBlocksToScreen
description: ($C704)($A194)ShowWindow, bank 1. | ($C706) | ($C707)Will always be 0.

name: AddInvItem
label: AddInvItem
description: ($E017) | ($E019)Branch always to tell player they are cursed. | ($E01B)Store a copy of the inventory item and zero out index.

name: AddInvLoop
label: AddInvLoop
description: ($E01B)Store a copy of the inventory item and zero out index. | ($E01D) | ($E01F)Is the lower nibble inventory slot already occupied?

name: AddItemBonuses
label: AddItemBonuses
description: ($F0C6)Penalize max HP. | ($F0C8)($F10C)Multiply stat by 9/10. | ($F0CB)

name: AddPPUBufferEntry
label: AddPPUBufferEntry
description: ($C68E)Move to next palette byte. | ($C68F) | ($C690)

name: AddPalByte
label: AddPalByte
description: ($C659)($C661)Add a byte of palette data to the PPU buffer. | ($C65C)Have all the palettes been processed? | ($C65E)If not, branch to add color data to another palette.

name: AlreadyWearingRing
label: AlreadyWearingRing
description: ($DFDD)($C7CB)Player put on the fighter's ring... | ($DFE0)TextBlock4, entry 14. | ($DFE1)

name: AlternateDialog
label: AlternateDialog
description: ($D15C)($C7C5)Hurray! Hurray!... | ($D15F)TextBlock18, entry 15. | ($D160)($CFD9)Give control back to player.

name: ApplyPurchase
label: ApplyPurchase
description: ($D613) | ($D615)Set players gold to max value of 65535. | ($D617)

name: ApplyShield
label: ApplyShield
description: ($D64B)Equip new armor. | ($D64D) | ($D64F)Branch always to complete process.

name: AttributeLoop
label: AttributeLoop
description: ($C01A)Load bitmask for clearing selected nametable bits. | ($C01C)Is bit counter 0? | ($C01E)If so, branch. No need to do any shifting.

name: BGGFXLoadLoop
label: BGGFXLoadLoop
description: ($E3DA) | ($E3DC)Buffer combat background graphics in | ($E3DE)RAM starting at $050A.

name: BGGFXScreenLoop
label: BGGFXScreenLoop
description: ($E408)If not, branch to load more. | ($E40A)($FF74)Wait for VBlank interrupt. | ($E40D)($B6DA)Update player and NPC sprites.

name: BGLoadRow
label: BGLoadRow
description: ($E3E0) | ($E3E2)Keeps track of current location in row. | ($E3E4)Is the combat happening on the overworld?

name: BWScreenFlash
label: BWScreenFlash
description: ($DB34)($DA55)Print text indicating spell did not work. | ($DB37)Prepare to flash screen 8 times.

name: Bank0ToNT0
label: Bank0ToNT0
description: ($FC9B) | ($FC9E)($FFAC)load nametable 0 with CHR ROM bank 1. | ($FCA1)

name: Bank0ToNT1
label: Bank0ToNT1
description: ($FCA3)Save A on stack. | ($FCA4)Indicate CHR ROM bank 0 to be loaded. | ($FCA6)Load it into nametable 0.

name: Bank1ToNT0
label: Bank1ToNT0
description: ($FC96)Restore A. | ($FC97) | ($FC98)Save A on stack.

name: Bank2ToNT1
label: Bank2ToNT1
description: ($FCA8)Indicate CHR ROM bank 0 to be loaded. | ($FCA9) | ($FCAB)Load it into nametable 1.

name: Bank3ToNT1
label: Bank3ToNT1
description: ($FCB0) | ($FCB3)($FFC2)load nametable 1. | ($FCB6)Restore A and return.

name: BattleBlock
label: BattleBlock
description: ($C72E) | ($C730)Clear bottom row of block. | ($C731)

name: BlankBlock
label: BlankBlock
description: ($C717)Branch always. | This portion of code should never run under normal circumstances. | ($C71A)Remove no tiles from the current block.

name: Block2TileConv
label: Block2TileConv
description: ($C59E)Indicate data is being saved to RAM buffer. | ($C5A0) | ($C5A2)Set MSB to determine target later.

name: BlockStopSpell
label: BlockStopSpell
description: ($EC86)TextBlock16, entry 14. Spell is blocked... | ($EC88)($C7BD) | ($EC8B)($E5CE)It's the player's turn to attack.

name: BodyCursedDialog
label: BodyCursedDialog
description: ($E0BB)If not, branch to check if its the death necklace. | ($E0BD)Is the player wearing the cursed belt? | ($E0BF)If so, branch to check if player is discarding death necklace.

name: BridgeAnimDone
label: BridgeAnimDone
description: ($DEF7)Move to the next colors in the palette. | ($DEF9) | ($DEFB)Branch always.

name: BuildBridgeLoop1
label: BuildBridgeLoop1
description: ($DEC9)Load the initial color for rainbow flash. | ($DECB) | ($DECD)($FF74)Wait for VBlank interrupt.

name: BuildBridgeLoop2
label: BuildBridgeLoop2
description: ($DEC3) | ($DEC5)Prepare to cycle the rainbow flash colors 4 times. | ($DEC7)

name: BuyFairyWater
label: BuyFairyWater
description: ($D87B)($C7CB)Thou cannot carry anymore. | ($D87E)TextBlock3, entry 1. | ($D87F)($D855)End fairy water dialog.

name: BuyInnStay
label: BuyInnStay
description: ($D8C2)($C7CB)Though hast not enough money... | ($D8C5)TextBlock3, entry 2. | ($D8C6)($D8AF)Exit inn dialog.

name: BuyKey
label: BuyKey
description: ($D827)($C7CB)Thou hast not enough money. | ($D82A)TextBlock2, entry 3. | ($D82B)($D804)End key shop dialog.

name: ByteDivide
label: ByteDivide
description: ($C1EF)Done multiplying. | ($C1F0)Set upper byte of dividend to 0

name: CRCCheckFail
label: CRCCheckFail
description: ($FAEC)Indicate saved game data successfully copied. | ($FAED) | ($FAEF)($FB0C)Done making copies of the saved game.

name: CalcAttribAddr
label: CalcAttribAddr
description: ($C5E0)Not used. | ($C5E2) | ($C5E4)

name: CalcNextMap
label: CalcNextMap
description: ($D93D)Indicate player came down stairs. Always faces right. | ($D93F)Branch always. | ($D941)Indicate player new facing direction is table lookup.

name: CalcNextOdds
label: CalcNextOdds
description: ($EEC0)($C55B)Get random number. | ($EEC3) | ($EEC5)Keep only lower 6 bits(0-63).

name: CalcPPUBufAddr
label: CalcPPUBufAddr
description: ($C595)Buffer is free. Stop waiting. | ($C596)Indicate data is being saved to PPU address buffer.

name: CalcPlyrDmg
label: CalcPlyrDmg
description: ($ECED)($C55B)Get random number. | ($ECF0)Keep 3 bits(0-7). | ($ECF2)

name: CalcPlyrGold
label: CalcPlyrGold
description: ($EA24) | ($EA26)Max out player's experience. | ($EA28)

name: CalcRAMBufAddr
label: CalcRAMBufAddr
description: ($C596)Indicate data is being saved to PPU address buffer. | ($C598) | ($C59A)Set bit 6 to determine target later.

name: CalcSelectedSlot
label: CalcSelectedSlot
description: ($F9B8)($F9BB)Calculate save slot selected. | ($F9BB)Get bit mask for saved game slots.

name: CalcSlotExit
label: CalcSlotExit
description: ($F9D9)Must be slot 1 selected. Return 1st slot(0). | ($F9DB)Return 2nd game slot (count starts at 0). | ($F9DC)

name: CalcWhoIsNext
label: CalcWhoIsNext
description: ($EEBB) | ($EEBD) | ($EEC0)($C55B)Get random number.

name: CalculateExp
label: CalculateExp
description: ($D425)($C7CB)Thou art strong enough... | ($D428)TextBlock1, entry 2. | ($D429)($D433)Jump to save dialog.

name: CantSellCrsdItm
label: CantSellCrsdItm
description: ($D7C9)Save a copy of item to sell. | ($D7CA)Is player wearing the belt? | ($D7CC)If not, branch to sell it.

name: CaveEnIndexTbl
label: CaveEnIndexTbl
description: The following table dictates what random encounters will happen in the dungeons. The indexes | into the table correspond to the order of the caves starting with map number #$0F and ending | with map number #$1B. Each byte corresponds to a row in the EnemyGroupsTbl below.

name: ChangeMaps
label: ChangeMaps
description: ($D9DB) | ($D9DE)If not, branch to check next table entry. | ($D9E0)Came up stairs. Player always faces left.

name: Check10Copies
label: Check10Copies
description: ($FB34)Keep track of how many bytes total have been copied. | ($FB36) | ($FB38)

name: CheckAxeKnight
label: CheckAxeKnight
description: ($CD4E)($B228)Force player to exit the map. | ($CD51)Is the player in Hauksness?

name: CheckBlockDmg

The first byte is the current map number. | The next two bytes are the x and y positions respectively on the current map that connect to the | target map.  The coordinates are based on the upper left corner of the map and start at 0,0.

name: MapTargetTbl
label: MapTargetTbl
description: This table is the same size as the table above and each entry is the destination from the exits | above. Entry 1 in the table above corresponds to entry 1 in the table below. Stairs up use this | table for the current map and use the table above for the destination.
